publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-168.1 Fergus Ewing: Approval of SSI-As an amendment to motion (S2M-168) in the name of Patricia Ferguson, insert at end "but, in so doing, regrets that the Scottish Executive has made the request for additional resources in a manner that does not provide the Parliament with the opportunity of having a separate and distinct vote on the proposed extra cash for the Holyrood building project."
